description:
There is a village in the mountains, where pandas live a peaceful life in harmony and joy. However, pandas share their territory with envious neighbors: the monkeys. These creatures usually invade the pandaâ€™s village and destroy the entire town. You play as a panda and must protect the village by showing the monkeys who is the boss.
- Build houses, cloth stores, restaurants, weaponry, defenses, and magic towers. Create infrastructure for your panda folks. Be the witness to the development of the village. But remember, monkeys will try to destroy it all!
- Build defense to protect the village from intruders. You can build crossbows, cannons, and catapults. 
- Fight against monkeys invading your village and save pandas. But don't worry, you will not be alone. Panda defenders will also help you protect the village.
- You will have access to multiple weapon types ranging from simple wooden clubs to sci-fi slashers
- Your neighbors are knight monkeys, intelligent feces-throwing monkeys, magician baboons, strong gorillas, and fierce orangutans 
- Have you heard of fashion? That's right! You can build and visit cloth stores and wear cool stuff. Fashion, baby!
name: Panda's Village
intro: Help cute pandas to stand against obnoxious neighbors who constantly invade the village of peace!
